definition: to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: They are marching off to gyms and discovering face cream in record numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他们向健身房进军，物色到的面霜数目已创历史新高。

sentences.english: Results will usually be better than if you spend 2 hours lolly-gagging around the gym. But be warned.
sentences.chinese: 而且效果通常比你在健身房晃荡两小时来得好。

sentences.english: People also meet in student clubs and organizations, and in the gym.
sentences.chinese: 对埃默里大学学生的来说健身也是非常重要的。

sentences.english: There is no time to exercise.
Aerobic activity is the cornerstone of most fitness programs.
sentences.chinese: 有氧运动是大多数健身项目的基础。

sentences.english: Yeah, and I do an hour of aerobics every other day.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我每隔一天做一个小时的健身操。

sentences.english: Massage therapists and fitness trainers work fewer hours per week than any other professionals.
sentences.chinese: 按摩师和健身教练每周的工作时间比其他职业都要少。

sentences.english: This theory has become the theoretical framework for China’s current qigong and health preservation studies.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论已成为当今气功健身研究的基础理论。

sentences.english: Does your apartment have a gym onsite?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓内有健身房吗？

sentences.english: I want to go to a gym with aerobics.
sentences.chinese: 我要去健身房跳有氧操。

sentences.english: Wear comfortable workout clothes and no shoes or socks.
sentences.chinese: 穿上舒适的健身服，不要穿鞋袜。

sentences.english: Third, make non-native population participate in all-people body-building activities.
sentences.chinese: 三是针对外来人口全民健身活动。

sentences.english: Bodybuilding has always been a form of re-search .
sentences.chinese: 健身是一种研究的形式。

sentences.english: A gymnasium was added to the indoor stadium.
sentences.chinese: 在室内体育馆里为学生增建健身室。

sentences.english: You spend one-second of the monthly expense on body-building .
sentences.chinese: 你将月开销的二分之一用于健身运动。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
(Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])
to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
to maintain good health/to raise a child or animal/curing (of concrete etc)
healthy and beautiful/to do fitness exercises/abbr. for 健美運動|健美运动[jian4 mei3 yun4 dong4]
